post.text: At the Commander-in-Chief forum, Trump disrespected our generals, our country, and women in the military. Who did he praise? Putin.

comment.author: Nathan
comment.text: Tough talking Trump avoided the draft for temporary "heel spurs" just as he stepped out a military academy only to become an allstar athlete in football, tennis and squash. Now he has the audacity to disparage those who answered the call to duty including John McCain and his years of service, torture and imprisonment. Is this the kind of coward and A-hole for president? Trump's 88 military personnel endorsements amount to less than 17% of the 500 + that penned an open letter supporting Romney. None of the signatories was a service chief or led a major combatant command.

replies.author: Haydar
replies.text: Hillary's ...... "We are going to raise taxes on the middle class." "We're going to put a lot of coal miners and coal companies out of business." "Don't let anybody tell you that it's corporations and businesses that create jobs." "I remember landing under sniper" "I did not uh send uh or receive any classified material uh there was no classified material" "director Comey said my answers were truthful" "I ONLY used 1 device" "What difference at this point does it make" -Hillary Clinton...

replies.author: Haydar
replies.text: Kilary belongs in jail with O.J
